header.title: C.I.A
header.subtitle: Welcome to the Club d'Intelligence Artificielle (CIA) of Laval University!

about.title: About Us
about.description: The CIA is the artificial intelligence club of Laval University. We are a group of students exploring AI and machine learning through various hands-on projects. Join us to learn and collaborate on exciting AI endeavors!

decisiontree.title: Decision Tree
decisiontree.description: Research and development of decision trees

collaboration.title: Interested in collaborating?
collaboration.description: Sponsors help us achieve our goals and bring our projects to life. Interested in collaborating with us? Check out our plans.

footer.slogan: Shape the unknown, code the impossible.

collaborationPage.subtitle: Invest in the Future of AI Research
collaborationPage.intro: Join our mission to push the boundaries of AI technology. Your sponsorship fuels cutting-edge research, empowers student innovators, and creates solutions that transform industries.
collaborationPage.readyText1: Join forward-thinking organizations that are shaping the future of artificial intelligence. Our partnerships provide more than just exposure – they offer direct access to cutting-edge research, talented students, and innovative solutions.
collaborationPage.readyText2: Custom sponsorship packages are available for organizations with specific research interests or collaboration goals. Let's discuss how we can create value together.
collaborationPage.contactMessage: How would you like to support our projects?

fundedProjectsDescriptions.MangaTranslator AI: AI-powered manga translation system for real-time panel conversion.
fundedProjectsDescriptions.FlapEEG: EEG-based control system for interactive gaming.
fundedProjectsDescriptions.F1Tenth: 1/10th scale Formula 1 car controlled by muscle signals.

management.pageDescription: Meet the Executive, Leadership, and Associate teams of the EEG organization. Learn more about their roles and connect with them on LinkedIn.
management.pageKeywords: EEG, Management, Team, Leadership, Executive, Associates, LinkedIn

gallery.pageTitle: Gallery - Explore EEG Projects, Competitions, and Community Events
gallery.pageDescription: Explore our gallery showcasing EEG projects, competitions, and community events. Learn more about our journey in AI, EEG technology, and community impact.
gallery.pageKeywords: EEG, gallery, projects, competitions, community, AI, events, formations
gallery.ogDescription: Explore EEG projects, competitions, and community involvement in our dynamic gallery.
gallery.twitterDescription: Discover the EEG gallery featuring projects, competitions, community involvement, and formation discussions.
